Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Usually fabric-test-verify job runs almost 60 mins - 90 mins.. Some time tests are skipping due to the error and shows a false positive in few mins. Based on this observation it;s better to continue build time with 240 mins. See the below unstable build.. This build ran for 1 hr 53 mins https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/fabric-test/job/fabric-test-verify-x86_64/1231/
